phrs.translation: 柯枝, 科钦, 柯钦, 印度科钦
科钦堡, 位于, 科钦岛
科钦国际机场, 柯钦国际机场, 距离柯枝国际机场
科钦堡海滩, 柯钦堡海滩

sentences.sentence: MAD started in Cochin, but now has programs in 11 districts in India and over 800 volunteers.
sentences.translation: MAD成立于柯钦，但是如今它已在印度的11个地区有项目，还有超过800名志愿者。

sentences.sentence: MAD (Make A Difference) was started by a group of college students in Cochin, a city in the Southwestern state of Kerala, India.
sentences.translation: 是由一群在柯钦——印度喀啦啦西南部的一个城市——的大学生成立的。
